docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 9 -- The international position of the United States, took an unexpected turn for the better, on the propaganda level, at least, and Mr. Dulles unbent so far as to characterize his foremost diplomatic and propagandistic protagonist...

docs.snippet: KLM Royal Dutch Airlines has announced that it will abolish tourist-class accommodations on its North Atlantic routes beginning Nov. 1. The tourist service will be taken up by the newly established economy fare, with which the carrier has had great...
docs.lead_paragraph: KLM Royal Dutch Airlines has announced that it will abolish tourist-class accommodations on its North Atlantic routes beginning Nov. 1. The tourist service will be taken up by the newly established economy fare, with which the carrier has had great success this past spring and summer.

docs.snippet: IN addition to the other pleasures it affords, the reading of history can be very comforting. The knowledge that other men and other times suffered from the same follies and the same passions as we do, somehow reduces the anguish of our own.
